page.title: 04WESTMESTON CHURCH,SUSSEX
page.content: {] CHURCH Westmeston Church was built in the 12th century,and extensions were built up to 1880. The church looks old and is made of flint,stone and wood.It is decorated with stained glass windows. The church holds annual money raising functions,eg:fetes,flower shows,to help repair and maintain the church. Although only 1 in 5 of the villagers go to church regularly everyone attends on Christmas Day. Westmeston village is very small. The villagers are mainly retired. Those who work have to travel out of the district.There is no emergency services,There are no shops.there are no main drains.They have Tudor,Victorian and Modern houses. There are more horses than people.
